page.title: 04RELIGION IN CALDER VALE
page.content:
{Methodist:}There is a Methodist Chapel in the centre of the village overlooking the mill square. Services are held each Sunday and there are also such things as Sunday School as well as discussion groups for older people. The chapel tends to be a focal point for many Methodists in the area. The Methodist Minister lives in Garstang.
{Roman Catholic: }At present people of the Roman Catholic faith worship in a room set aside for that purpose above the Post Office in Calder Vale. This arragement has been going on for some years. Sometime in the near future they will be moving to the "Mission Room" which adjoins the village hall. This room is owned and used occasionally by the people of St John's CE Church.
